# Value

**Associated Type**

The type of the key’s value.

## Declaration

```swift
associatedtype Value
```

## Discussion

Swift typically infers this type from your implementation of the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/LayoutValueKey/defaultValue] property, so you don’t have to define it explicitly.

## Providing a default value

- **defaultValue**: The default value of the key.

items.description: The default value of the key.
items.name: defaultValue
